item.title: About
item.description: Italy to Spain to Germany to UK I started my professional life studying Computer Science at the University of Trento in Italy and completed my Master’s Degree in Machine Learning at the University of Catalunya, Barcelona. In 2016 I moved to Berlin, Germany, where I started working as Machine Learning Researcher, Software Engineer and Data Scientist. It soon became clear to me that access to self-awareness, trust, and effective communication profoundly influenced the value and quality of the work shipped in organizations as well as the overall happiness of the people around me.
